document.full_text: europe's energy chief warned on wednesday of a further catastrophe at japan's nuclear site in the coming hours but his spokeswoman said he had no specific or privileged information on the situation.
document.title: eu energy chief says japan reactor "out of control"
lines_and_colors: europe's energy chief warned on wednesday of a further catastrophe at japan's nuclear site in the coming hours but his spokeswoman said he had no specific or privileged information on the situation.
